document.discussion_title: WIN: A month’s supply of fresh fruit boxes from Fruitful Day
document.topic_text: Home » Competitions » WIN: A month’s supply of fresh fruit boxes from Fruitful Day WIN: A month’s supply of fresh fruit boxes from Fruitful Day Posted on 11.08.16 by Chandini Guria WIN: A month’s supply of fresh fruit boxes from Fruitful Day Calling all fruit lovers – we’ve got an exciting competition for you this week! Fruitful Day is a homegrown company that delivers fresh fruit directly to your doorstep, and we’re giving one lucky reader the chance to win a month’s supply of small discovery boxes! That means every week, you’ll wake up to a box of fresh, seasonal fruits that have been expertly curated for maximum taste and enjoyment. And the best thing about Fruitful Day’s discovery boxes – you just never know what you’re going to get! So whether you’re packing lunch boxes for the kids, or you’re someone who’s always on the go, Fruitful Day is delighted to bring you great tasting, fresh, seasonal fruit that’s conveniently ready to eat – saving you time and making your day a little brighter. To win, choose the correct answer and fill in the below form by Thursday, August 18th .
